title: Zeno Clash UE
description: In the land of Zenozoik, the city of Halstedom is ruled by a powerful clan, one which Ghat has betrayed by killing Father-Mother, the clan's leader. As Ghat, you'll have to face your brothers and sisters, insane anarchists and other enemies, in order to escape in this unique first-person puncher. The bare-knuckled brawl to reach the truth has just begun. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Zeno Clash Ultimate Edition Co-op Challenges Trailer (HD)

In the land of Zenozoik, the city of Halstedom is ruled by a powerful clan, one which Ghat has betrayed by killing Father-Mother, the clan's leader. childDownloads.title: Zeno Clash Ultimate Edition Corwids Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: The Corwids of the Free are a band of fierce, lunatic individualists. Each Corwid has his or her own driving obsession, which they’ll pursue beyond reason, bodily needs, or anything else. It is for this reason that the Corwids are feared and distrusted amongst the people of Halstedom. With Ghat driven out of Halstedom by the family, it’s only a matter of time before you encounter the Corwids and get to form an opinion of your own…  In the land of Zenozoik, the city of Halstedom is ruled by a powerful clan, one which Ghat has betrayed by killing Father-Mother, the clan's leader. As Ghat, you'll fight your way through your former brothers and sisters, crazed individualists, and worse in order to escape in this unique first-person puncher.

childDownloads.title: Zeno Clash Ultimate Edition Gameplay Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Get an up-close view of the visceral first-person combat that makes up Zeno Clash: Ultimate Edition. Start with a series of punches, kicks, and grabs, follow up with a knee to the enemy’s face, and hit him with a finishing move that’ll send him flying yards away. Guns and melee weapons offer additional power and tactical options.
